channel.title: Node.js on Personal Developer Site
channel.description: Recent content in Node.js on Personal Developer Site

item.title: Create Boilerplate Project
item.description: create-boilerplate-project Generator that will create a base boilerplate project for various frameworks. No need to fork and clone boilerplate projects to keep up. This module will generate one for you based on many of the popular boilerplate projects.

item.title: Project Hydra
item.description: project-hydra A salary cap tracking and planning application. Cross platform desktop and web application.
